Personal_information.name: Jonas Maciel
Personal_information.About_me: Graduated in information technology management from Anhembi Morumbi University in the capital city of Sao Paulo, Brazil. Currently completing a new academic training in computer sciences at Borough of Manhattan college. More than 6 years of professional experience in diverse sectors, I have strong knowledge in development and improvement

Web_Skill.content: A passionate web developer specializing in frontend technologies. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create dynamic and responsive web applications that deliver seamless user experiences.-Versed in utilizing jQuery to enhance interactivity and streamline complex functionalities, allowing for efficient manipulation of the Document Object Model (DOM). Additionally, I leverage Bootstrap to ensure that my designs are not only aesthetically pleasing but also mobile friendly, adhering to the latest industry standards.
Development of professional-level business rules with good programming practices.
Professional development of interfaces, business rules and relational databases.

Testimonial.Name: Rafael Rocha
Testimonial.Testimonial:
I had the opportunity to work with Jonas at Cloudfox for 1 year, an organization focused on the online payments sector. During this period, Jonas performed tasks related to specific activities such as interface development, API integration, and code optimization. As his direct supervisor, he often consulted me on technical and strategic decisions, demonstrating maturity by seeking guidance and feedback to improve his work.

Jonas is an extremely dedicated, responsible, and collaborative individual. His commitment to delivering quality work, combined with his professional ethics, has always been evident. He possesses outstanding qualities such as teamwork, a constant pursuit of learning, and attention to code quality, which make him a reliable and valuable professional. During the time I worked with him at Cloudfox, I observed his growth as a professional as well as his humility in asking questions, learning, and sharing knowledge with colleagues. This reflects his character and willingness to contribute to the team’s success.

As a developer, I believe Jonas's main strengths lie in his technical skills and adaptability. He has excellent front-end development expertise, with solid knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Bootstrap, Vue, and React, enabling him to build efficient and user-friendly interfaces. Furthermore, Jonas is also capable of working on the back end, with familiarity in technologies such as PHP and Python, as well as their respective frameworks, which expands his range of skills and makes him a versatile professional.

What truly sets Jonas apart is his attention to detail and focus on clean code, practices that ensure the quality and maintainability of the projects he works on. His proactive attitude, combined with his ability to solve problems and learn quickly, makes him a developer who adds value to any team.

As his former senior colleague, I recommend Jonas as a Developer without hesitation. His strengths include:

Technical excellence in front-end development, with the ability to transition to back-end tasks;
Proactivity and teamwork, always willing to help and learn from others;
Organization and attention to quality, reflected in his deliveries and care for clean code.
Regarding areas for improvement, I believe Jonas has room to grow in aspects related to system architecture and more complex algorithms. However, it is important to highlight that, during the time I worked with him, I witnessed his continuous evolution and his effort to overcome challenges.

For all these reasons, I believe Jonas will be a highly valuable professional for any development team fortunate enough to have him.

Testimonial.Name: Anderson Brasilino
Testimonial.Testimonial:
Jonas is an extremely dedicated and committed individual who always strives to deliver the best possible work. With a proactive and determined approach, he stands out for his teamwork skills, clean code practices, and constant pursuit of learning. I had the opportunity to witness his growth during the time we worked together at Company Nanx. Beyond being an excellent professional, Jonas demonstrated humility by asking questions, learning, and sharing his knowledge with colleagues.

Jonas as a Developer
As a developer, Jonas possesses several strengths that bring significant value to any team. He particularly excels in Front-End development, mastering technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Additionally, he has the versatility to work on the Back-End, using PHP and Python, which broadens his technical skill set. Another admirable quality is his ability to solve problems creatively and efficiently, always focusing on delivering quality work.

Recommendation
As his former supervisor, I highly recommend Jonas as a developer and highlight his main qualities: his expertise in Front-End technologies, his teamwork abilities, and his continuous learning mindset. He is a valuable professional. Without a doubt, Jonas would be a great asset to any company.

Testimonial.Name: Fernando Carvalho
Testimonial.Testimonial:
Professional Relationship
We worked together at CADDesign for approximately 5 years, a company specialized in SAAS solutions for logistics, with a focus on routing and real-time order monitoring.
Jonas worked directly on the development team, especially focusing on front-end interfaces and integration with systems operated by drivers via app. As his direct supervisor, he often consulted me on technical decisions, UX and integration with legacy systems.

Jonas – The Person
Jonas is a collaborative, curious and committed person.
Always willing to learn and contribute, he is one of those professionals who add value to the work environment not only through his code, but also through his attitude. His humble demeanor when asking questions, accepting criticism and sharing knowledge makes him a valuable asset to any team.
During our time together, I was able to follow his technical and personal development, as well as notice his continuous effort to improve himself.
 
Jonas – The Developer
As a developer, Jonas has clear strengths: attention to detail, writing clean code and focusing on usability.
His specialty is front-end, with mastery of technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. Even so, he also stands out for his versatility: he has a good understanding of backend with PHP, which allows him to navigate between demands of different natures with confidence.
His difference lies in the combination of curiosity, discipline and delivery capacity — always seeking to understand the why of solutions, and not just the how.
